name: Tripleforce
description:
Compatible tomes have @{attribute::Spellblade} while in this unit's inventory. Once per enemy phase, this unit can spend 3 TP to use one of these reactions:

 • Saber Throw - Trigger: after a foe misses this unit with an attack. Make a counterattack against that foe with equipped tome regardless of range.
 • Force Push - Trigger: After foe creates a tile within 3 spaces of this unit. Use @{art::Telekinesis} targeting a player created tile, regardless of tile type.
 • Mind Trick - Trigger: Foe ends combat against this unit. Apply @{condition:Confused:[Confused]} and @{condition:Berserk:[Berserk]} to that foe for one turn; that foe moves and acts again during the next player phase and this unit is removed from the battlefield during player phase until it does.
